description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf
☺  Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca


This episode I show you some techniques to improve your large rock terrain. I show you two methods of easy foam carving to create interesting rock shapes, a method for coating the pieces in a material that makes the rocks incredibly strong and adds a cool texture effect. I also show you how to complete the project with a more advanced painting technique than two tone grey.













Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: Better Looking Big Rock Terrain For D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 033)
